data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 6, Wolverhampton push forward at Turf Moor and Rayan Ait-Nouri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Burnley defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Wolverhampton in Burnley.
Burnley will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Wolverhampton.
In the minute 7, Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Burnley defender.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Burnley in the half of Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a Burnley throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
In the minute 11, In Burnley Burnley attack through Ashley Barnes. The finish is off target, however.
Lee Stephen Mason awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Ashley Barnes for Burnley is whistled offside.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Burnley.
Wolverhampton's Nelson Semedo has run offside.
Burnley are pushing forward but Chris Wood's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
In the minute 19, Wolverhampton's Romain Saiss attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Turf Moor.
In the minute 21, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Burnley.
The match at Turf Moor has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ben Mee, who is down injured.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a throw-in for Burnley, close to Wolverhampton's area.
In the minute 23, Burnley's Ben Mee is back in action after a slight knock.
Pedro Neto of Wolverhampton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Burnley's Matthew Lowton breaks free at Turf Moor. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
In the minute 26, Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ashley Barnes for Burnley drives towards goal at Turf Moor. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Burnley capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
Robbie Brady (Burnley) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Turf Moor.
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Wolverhampton.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
Burnley have a dangerous throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Burnley close to the penalty box.
In the minute 35, Burnley move into a 1-0 lead through a Ashley Barnes header.
Charlie Taylor with an assist there.
In the minute 36, In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ashley Westwood (Burnley) has received a first yellow card.
Wolverhampton's Ruben Neves gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
In the minute 38, Ruben Neves for Wolverhampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Burnley have a goal kick.
Free kick Burnley.
In the minute 40, In Burnley Burnley attack through Josh Brownhill. The finish is off target, however.
Lee Stephen Mason awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Lee Stephen Mason awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Lee Stephen Mason waits before resuming play because Ebeguowen Otasowie for Wolverhampton is still down.
James Tarkowski is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ebeguowen Otasowie is back on his feet again.
In the minute 43, Lee Stephen Mason signals a Burnley throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
James Tarkowski for Burnley is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Burnley close to the penalty box.
In the minute 44, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Burnley.
Burnley are coming forward and Chris Wood gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
The first-half has ended.
Ebeguowen Otasowie for Wolverhampton has been booked by Lee Stephen Mason and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Wolverhampton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
In the minute 49, Burnley to take a throw-in in Wolverhampton territory.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a Burnley throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Burnley apply pressure at Turf Moor and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Josh Brownhill but the strike hits the bar!
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Free kick for Burnley in the half of Wolverhampton.
It's now 2-0 in Burnley as Chris Wood scores for Burnley.
In the minute 54, Lee Stephen Mason awards Burnley a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Wolverhampton.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Burnley.
In the minute 60, The away team have replaced Rayan Ait-Nouri with Adama Traore. This is the first substitution made today by Nuno Espirito Santo.
Fabio Silva is replacing Ebeguowen Otasowie for Wolverhampton at Turf Moor.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Pedro Neto (Wolverhampton) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Burnley have a goal kick.
Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Burnley.
Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
In the minute 65, Chris Wood gets his shot on target but fails to score for Burnley.
In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
In the minute 69, Robbie Brady is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
It seems as if Robbie Brady is unable to continue. Erik Pieters replaces him for the home team.
Burnley needs to be cautious. Wolverhampton have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 71, Free kick Burnley.
Burnley attack but James Tarkowski's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
In the minute 72, In Burnley a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
In Burnley Wolverhampton drive forward through Ruben Neves. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Ruben Neves (Wolverhampton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 75, Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Nuno Espirito Santo is making the team's third substitution at Turf Moor with Vitinha replacing Ruben Neves.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Burnley.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lee Stephen Mason awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Turf Moor.
In the minute 79, Wolverhampton drive upfield and Daniel Podence gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Burnley defender.
Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Can Wolverhampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
In the minute 81, Lee Stephen Mason signals a throw-in for Wolverhampton, close to Burnley's area.
Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Sean Dyche (Burnley) is making a second substitution, with Jay Rodriguez replacing Ashley Barnes.
In the minute 83, Lee Stephen Mason awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Can Wolverhampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Burnley's half?
In the minute 84, Fabio Silva of Wolverhampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Burnley at Turf Moor.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 86, Lee Stephen Mason signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Burnley to check on Dwight McNeil, who is grimacing with pain.
Sean Dyche (Burnley) has taken off Dwight McNeil who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Josh Benson is the replacement.
In the minute 88, An attacking Wolverhampton player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Wolverhampton now trail just 2-1 thanks to a penalty from Fabio Silva.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Free kick in a good position for Burnley!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Burnley.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wolverhampton drive forward but Adama Traore is judged offside.
Throw-in Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolverhampton's Romain Saiss misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Lee Stephen Mason.
Lee Stephen Mason blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Jay Rodriguez (Burnley) has received a yellow card from Lee Stephen Mason.
